Cheap, easy to learn and impossible to master, there's always ways for improvement and defying the odds. It's gotten more "pay 2 play" recently, but is still very enjoyable with the initial starting roster.
its just a great fun game to play alone or with friends

A game that requires high persistence for grinding and teamwork skills. You play either as a murderer introvert or asshole extroverts :D. This game has its ups and downs but if you don't mind waiting in a lobby for hours as a killer or disconnecting teammates it should be fine. If you like all cliche horror monsters from the nostalgic days + some original ones, this game might fit your fancy. 
Or if you just like to run from them as well..
Muy divertido y todo pero cuando quiero jugar como assesino tarda demasiado para entrar a una partida
Probably the best of all the asymmetrical horror games, would recommend to anyone who enjoys the genre.
